languages.text: "Мы все пребываем в тревоге о судьбе {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромира{/g} Янус, что снабжал Даргонус и иные планеты продуктами — пустые животы могут поднять на бунт даже самую смирную чернь. Кроме того, род Гапрак в смятении от утраты связи с подотчетным им {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальным миром{/g} Кьява Гамма. Но, если вам угодно знать мое мнение, в первую очередь внимание стоит уделить миру-тюрьме Веабос-6 — одному из основных поставщиков полезных ископаемых в вашем протекторате".

traits.locale_text: "Мы все пребываем в тревоге о судьбе агромира Янус, что снабжал Даргонус и иные планеты продуктами — пустые животы могут поднять на бунт даже самую смирную чернь. Нам недостает питания не только для живых ресурсов, но и священных машин — поставки прометиума с Гордости Сантиэля, коей ведует род Зауэрбэк, могут вскорости привести к техническому коллапсу. Кроме того, род Гапрак в смятении от утраты связи с подотчетным им индустриальным миром Кьява Гамма. Но, если вам угодно знать мое мнение, в первую очередь внимание стоит уделить Веабос-6 — одному из основных поставщиков полезных ископаемых в вашей торговой империи".

languages.text: "We are all troubled by the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is the penal world Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your protectorate."
languages.original_text: "Мы все пребываем в тревоге о судьбе {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромира{/g} Янус, что снабжал Даргонус и иные планеты продуктами — пустые животы могут поднять на бунт даже самую смирную чернь. Кроме того, род Гапрак в смятении от утраты связи с подотчетным им {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальным миром{/g} Кьява Гамма. Но, если вам угодно знать мое мнение, в первую очередь внимание стоит уделить миру-тюрьме Веабос-6 — одному из основных поставщиков полезных ископаемых в вашем протекторате".

traits.locale_text: "We are all troubled by the fate of the agri world Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. We lack provisions not only for our living resources, but also for our sacred machines — the situation with promethium shipments from Santiel's Pride, House Zowerback's fiefdom, may soon lead to a technical collapse. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the industrial world Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your trade empire."

"We are all troubled by the fate of the agri world Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. We lack provisions not only for our living resources, but also for our sacred machines — the situation with promethium shipments from Santiel's Pride, House Zowerback's fiefdom, may soon lead to a technical collapse. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the industrial world Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your trade empire."

"We are all troubled by the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is the penal world Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your protectorate."

languages.text: “我们都为{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}农业世界{/g}加努斯的情况感到不安，它负责为达戈努斯与其他行星提供食物。如果民众吃不饱饭，那恐怕就连最温驯的人也会造反。另外，贾帕克家族与他们麾下的{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}基亚瓦伽马星失去了联系，这让他们感到心神不宁。不过，如果您想听听我的意见的话，我认为您最需要关注的世界是刑罚世界维博斯六号星，那里是您的王朝最重要的矿业供应地之一。”
languages.original_text: "We are all troubled by the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is the penal world Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: “我们都为{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}农业世界{/g}加努斯的情况感到不安，它负责为达戈努斯与其他行星提供食物。如果民众吃不饱饭，那恐怕就连最温驯的人也会造反。另外，贾帕克家族与他们麾下的{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}基亚瓦伽马星失去了联系，这让他们感到心神不宁。不过，如果您想听听我的意见的话，我认为您最需要关注的世界是刑罚世界维博斯六号星，那里是您的王朝最重要的矿业供应地之一。”

languages.text: «A todos nos preocupa el destino del {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}mundo agrícola{/g} Janus, que abastece a Dargonus y otros planetas de comida. Tener el estómago vacío puede impulsar a la chusma más tranquila a rebelarse. Además, la casa Gaprak ha expresado consternación por la pérdida de comunicación con el {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de Kiava Gamma, del que son responsables. Pero si quiere saber mi opinión, el planeta que más necesita su atención es el mundo penal de Vheabos VI, uno de los proveedores principales de minerales en el protectorado».
languages.original_text: "We are all troubled by the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is the penal world Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: «A todos nos preocupa el destino del {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}mundo agrícola{/g} Janus, que abastece a Dargonus y otros planetas de comida. Tener el estómago vacío puede impulsar a la chusma más tranquila a rebelarse. Además, la casa Gaprak ha expresado consternación por la pérdida de comunicación con el {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de Kiava Gamma, del que son responsables. Pero si quiere saber mi opinión, el planeta que más necesita su atención es el mundo penal de Vheabos-VI, uno de los proveedores principales de minerales en el protectorado».

languages.text: 「私たちは皆、ダルゴナスやその他の惑星に食料を供給していた{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}農業惑星{/g}ヤヌスの行く末を案じています。飢えが続けば、どんなに穏やかな大衆でも反乱を起こしてしまう。また、ギャプラック家は自分たちが担っている{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}キアヴァ・ガンマと通信が途絶えたことに動揺しています。しかし、恐れ多くも私個人の意見を申し上げるならば、あなたが注力すべきは保護領の主な鉱山供給地のひとつである…流刑惑星ヴィアボス・VIだと思います」
languages.original_text: "We are all troubled by the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is the penal world Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは皆、ダルゴナスやその他の惑星に食料を供給していた{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}農業惑星{/g}ヤヌスの行く末を案じています。飢えが続けば、どんなに穏やかな大衆でも反乱を起こしてしまう。また、ギャプラック家は自分たちが担っている{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}キアヴァ・ガンマと通信が途絶えたことに動揺しています。しかし、恐れ多くも私個人の意見を申し上げるならば、あなたが注力すべきは保護領の主な鉱山供給地のひとつである…流刑惑星ヴィアボス・VIだと思います」

languages.text: "Uns alle beunruhigt das Schicksal der {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Agrarwelt{/g} Janus, die Dargonus und andere Planeten mit Nahrungsmitteln versorgt hat – ein leerer Magen kann selbst aus der geringsten Unzufriedenheit eine Revolte machen. Außerdem ist das Haus Gaprak nervös wegen des Kommunikationsverlusts mit der {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} Kiava Gamma, die in seiner Zuständigkeit liegt. Aber wenn Ihr meine Meinung hören wollt, am dringlichsten benötigt Eure Aufmerksamkeit die Strafwelt Vheabos VI – einer der wichtigsten Bergbauzulieferer in Eurem Protektorat."
languages.original_text: "We are all troubled by the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is the penal world Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Uns alle beunruhigt das Schicksal der {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWolrd}Agrarwelt{/g} Janus, die Dargonus und andere Planeten mit Nahrungsmitteln versorgt hat – ein leerer Magen kann selbst aus der geringsten Unzufriedenheit eine Revolte machen. Außerdem ist das Haus Gaprak nervös wegen des Kommunikationsverlusts mit der {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} Kiava Gamma, die in seiner Zuständigkeit liegt. Aber wenn Ihr meine Meinung hören wollt, am dringlichsten benötigt Eure Aufmerksamkeit die Strafwelt Vheabos-VI – einer der wichtigsten Bergbauzulieferer in Eurem Protektorat."

languages.text: « Le sort de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-monde{/g} de Janus, principale source de nourriture de Dargonus et d'autres planètes, est un grand sujet de préoccupation. Des estomacs vides peuvent conduire même les plus modérés à la révolte. La maison Gaprak s'inquiète également d'avoir perdu toute communication avec le {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} de Kiava Gamma, normalement sous leur responsabilité. Mais à mon humble avis, vous devriez commencer par vous pencher sur le cas du monde pénal de Vhéabos-VI, l'un des principaux fournisseurs de minerais du protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "We are all troubled by the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is the penal world Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: « Le sort de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-monde{/g} de Janus, principale source de nourriture de Dargonus et d'autres planètes, est un grand sujet de préoccupation. Des estomacs vides peuvent conduire même les plus modérés à la révolte. La maison Gaprak s'inquiète également d'avoir perdu toute communication avec le {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} de Kiava Gamma, normalement sous leur responsabilité. Mais à mon humble avis, vous devriez commencer par vous pencher sur le cas du monde pénal de Vhéabos-VI, l'un des principaux fournisseurs de minerais du protectorat. »

languages.text: "Dargonus'a ve diğer gezegenlere gıda sağlayan {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}zirai dünya{/g} Janus'a ne olduğu konusunda hepimiz endişeliyiz. Boş bir mide, en uyumlu ayaktakımını bile isyana sürükleyebilir. Gaprak Hanesi, yetkisi altındaki {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g} Kiava Gama ile iletişimi yitirdiğimiz için endişe içinde. Bana soracak olursanız da ilginizi en çok hak eden, protektoranızdaki kilit öneme sahip maden tedarikçilerinden olan ceza dünyası Vheabos VI'dır."
languages.original_text: "We are all troubled by the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} Janus that supplied Dargonus and other planets with foodstuffs — empty stomachs can drive even the mildest rabble to revolt. Furthermore, House Gaprak is perturbed by the loss of communication with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma, which is in their charge. But if you wish to know my opinion, the world that deserves your attention the most is the penal world Vheabos VI — one of the key mining suppliers in your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus'a ve diğer gezegenlere gıda sağlayan {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}zirai dünya{/g} Janus'a ne olduğu konusunda hepimiz endişeliyiz, boş bir mide en önemsiz ayaktakımını bile isyana sürükleyebilir. Gaprak Hanesi, yetkisi altındaki {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g} Kiava Gama ile iletişimi yitirdiğimiz için endişe içinde. Bana soracak olursanız ama, ilginizi en çok hak eden, protektoranızdaki kilit öneme sahip maden tedarikçilerinden biri olan ceza dünyası Vheabos VI."
